phase41_wave4_marriage.title: Wave 4.2: Marriage Market & Household Merger
phase41_wave4_marriage.instruction_raw: Implement the Marriage Market matcher and Execution Service (Absorption Strategy). Ensure Zero-Sum asset/debt transfer and lifecycle cleanup (resignation, etc.).

phase41_wave4_health.title: Wave 4.3: Social Health & Medical System
phase41_wave4_health.instruction_raw: Implement HealthDynamicsService, Medicine commodity consumption, and death triggers. Integrate with NeedsEngine for medicine prioritization.

phase41_wave4_politics.title: Wave 4.4: Political Orchestrator & Policy Voting
phase41_wave4_politics.instruction_raw: Implement PoliticalOrchestrator (Median Voter + Lobbying Vector). Ensure Zero-Sum lobbying payments to Gov treasury and policy clamping logic.

phase41_wave5_account_registry_fix.title: Wave 5.2: Account Registry & ID Hardening
phase41_wave5_account_registry_fix.instruction_raw: Implement monotonic ID counter and pre-registration hooks to prevent settlement race conditions during agent spawning/turnover.

phase41_wave5_saga_integrity_fix.title: Wave 5.3: Saga Participant Integrity Fix
phase41_wave5_saga_integrity_fix.instruction_raw: Harden SagaOrchestrator transition logic. Implement strict participant validation and robust DTO extraction for both dict and object types.
